Victor Davis Hanson: US is in turmoil, Europe is weak and China is now on the move — without apologies China has insidiously pivoted from global friend to its new role as overt global villain.

Peter Navarro: China has exploited coronavirus pandemic to advance its strategic interests – here’s how The Chinese Communist Party has a long history of exploiting crises to advance its strategic hegemony. It is doing so again with the coronavirus pandemic it created.

GOPers on Capitol Hill aren't wavering in support of Trump despite criticism It’s about inertia. And with few exceptions, President Trump has inertia on his side when it comes to the support of Congressional Republicans.
